description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Pita Pocket + Sweet Potato Fingers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Pita Pocket + Sweet Potato Fingers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g sweet potato, peeled, cut into thick chips
8 brown no added salt rice crackers (for snack)

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: Combine chicken, apple, yoghurt and mayonnaise. Stuff chicken mixture into pita pocket with lettuce.

Snack 1: 1. Preheat oven to 200oC (180oC fan-forced). Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place sweet potato on prepared tray, spray lightly with oil and sprinkle with paprika. Roast for 25 minutes or until golden and tender. Set aside to cool. Serve sweet potato chips with tzatziki to dip.
